text: Scott Conrad Bedke (born April 27, 1958) is an American politician who is the Lieutenant Governor of Idaho since 2023. He was a member of the Idaho House of Representatives from 2001 to 2022. In December 2012, Bedke became the speaker of the Idaho House of Representatives. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Idaho Category:Living people Category:Members of the Idaho Legislature
title: Scott Bedke
